item.description: The six-figure H-1B visa fee has jolted companies that have long relied on the program to bring in top global talent.

item.title: Trump administration reportedly plans to link autism to Tylenol use during pregnancy
item.description: Federal health officials also are expected to highlight leucovorin as a potential autism treatment, according to The Washington Post.

item.title: Schumer presses Trump to negotiate with Democrats as government shutdown deadline nears
item.description: The Senate last week rejected proposals to keep the government funded at least temporarily, raising the possibility of a lapse.

item.title: Trump says Murdochs are potential TikTok deal partners
item.description: President Donald Trump also said that Larry Ellison and Michael Dell are also likely to be involved in the TikTok deal.
